summary: Email chain between attorneys from Kaplan Hecker & Fink LLP and an Assistant United States Attorney (AUSA) from the Southern District of New York regarding a request for information from the DOJ relating to Jeffrey Epstein. The request is connected to pending litigation against Epstein's estate.

keyFacts: Attorneys from Kaplan Hecker & Fink LLP are engaged in pending litigation against the estate of Jeffrey Epstein.
The legal team has submitted a formal Touhy request to the Department of Justice seeking documents related to Jeffrey Epstein.
The correspondence indicates an ongoing effort by private attorneys to obtain government-held information for use in civil litigation following Epstein's death.
The email chain spans from January to April 2020, showing a multi-month process of legal inquiry and follow-up.
